divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my back just laying down on a piece of lawn furniture pretty bored then right over my head really high up was a white cigar shaped thing and as soon as i saw it my whole body got this weird warming sensation then it faded out and faded back more rounded this time might have just been like the angle then i ran in my house to get my camera still warm and tingly then when it faded back into sight i lined it up but when i pressed record it left again but there were jets looking like they were chasing it to the south came from north going south with it then a few minutes late it reappeared on the other side of my neighbors house that i lost it behind going west and just stopped so i got three pictues of it the whole time i was still warm and my dog was howling her brains out and she never howls then it shot off so fast it made the trees under it move and it was shortly followed by jets that didn't have a chance
